Articles.Content: I'm don't know is it only me ,but when I turn the Docking mode on and press W or S it doesn't make my spacecraft goes forward or backward but it pitch up or down.Also the A,D,Shift and Ctrl doesn't do it's job correctly. (KSP1.02)Is it a bug or something changed.

Docking mode has been changed with 1.0, some keys now have two functions. There are two things you can do:

1- Try to remove double functions in the settings but I've heard it's not that simple (or go directly to settings.cfg)

2- Use the translating keys while in staging mode, default configuration is:

I: translate up

K: translate down

J: translate left

L: translate right

H: translate forward

N: translate backwards

"Is it a bug or something changed."

Something has changed.

See [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117181-Have-docking-controls-changed-Shift-throttles-up-while-in-docking-mode?p=1880993&viewfull=1#post1880993](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117181-Have-docking-controls-changed-Shift-throttles-up-while-in-docking-mode?p=1880993&viewfull=1#post1880993)
